page.title: 02ARTS AND CRAFTS.
page.content: . A well known sculptor whose statue of Sir Winston Churchill stands in Parliament Square lives and works in Cratfield. There are two cabinet makers who specialise in repairs to antique furnture, one of whom is also a clockmaker, an artist and a photographer. These are all professionals. There are several amateur painters. Other hobbies include carpentry, the making and furnishing of dolls' houses, leatherwork, rugmaking, spinning, weaving, the making of soft furnishings, embrodiery, patchwork, photography and the making oif homemade wines.
